category.title: Peaceable Assembly (Occupation)
category.description: Report of an peaceable assembly at an ocupation site (as opposed to an assembly temporarily established and disbanded)

category.title: Peaceable Assembly (Temporary)
category.description: Report of an peaceable assembly established at a spot for a specific timeperiod (as opposed to an assembly at an occupation site)

category.title: Power Recharge
category.description: Place where electricity can be obtained by the public to recharge camera equipment, and computing devices

category.description: Report the location of a restroom available to the public
